tool_description: A Simple API that will give you the solution to every day's Wordle Puzzle.
name: Wordle Breaker
title: Wordle Breaker

api_list.name: Get Last Letter
api_list.description: This will return today's wordle last letter!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wordle-breaker.p.rapidapi.com/lastletter"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wordle-breaker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
